1.ruleDesc: Behave yourself and respect the other members of this community.

3.ruleDesc: Toxic or hateful comments on Discord or in the clan chat won't be tolerated.

4.ruleDesc: No E-dating within our community. Yes this is a real rule.

5.ruleDesc: No scamming in this community will be tolerated. Offenders will be trialed on Runewatch.

6.ruleDesc: Violating Jagex code of conduct will not be tolerated.

7.ruleDesc: Any political, religion or controversial conversations can be shutdown at any time by a star rank. If you don't cooperate, you will get temporarily kicked from the cc.

1.ruleDesc: PVM groups of five or more accompanied by a star-rank may request the trip to become an event. (Includes Chambers of Xeric and Theater of Blood)

2.ruleDesc: All valuable drops will be given to a present star-rank.

3.ruleDesc: Rules for the event are at the discretion of the star-rank who hosted the event.

1.ruleDesc: All uniques over 1m WILL be split, perpetrators will be reported to Runewatch.

2.ruleDesc: :cox~2: - The person who scouts the raid gets the keystone crystal at tightrope.

3.ruleDesc: :cox~2: - Don't assume everyone is experienced, be polite and understand that not everyone is Woox.

4.ruleDesc: :tob~1: - Split all uniques unless otherwise decided, perpetrators will be reported to Runewatch.

5.ruleDesc: :corp: - All onyx bolts and sigil drops are split unless the star-rank host says otherwise.

7.ruleDesc: :corp: - During masses, crystal halberds and dragon halberds are prohibited. (unless otherwise stated by the host)
